step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
Excellent! You're placing your hands correctly on your abdomen to feel the breath.
Great inhale! Remember to tighten your whole body muscles and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Well done relaxing your muscles on the exhale. Visualize pushing fluid out as you breathe.
Good start for the second repetition. Maintain a comfortable posture.
Perfect hand placement on your abdomen for this breath.
Nice deep inhale! Continue to engage your whole body muscles and focus on the fluid visualization.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out as you complete this breath.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! You consistently followed the instructions for hand placement and breathing technique. Remember to keep tightening your body muscles on the inhale and relaxing on the exhale to maximize lymphatic flow.
